description: This file contains PostgreSQL row-level security (RLS) enablement commands, function definitions, and access policies for a learning management system's database schema, including tables for users, courses, content, enrollments, quizzes, questions, submissions, and assignments.
published: policy: Users select own or admin
policy: Users update own or admin
policy: Content read enrolled or admin
policy: Enrollments select own or admin
policy: Quizzes read enrolled or admin
policy: Questions read enrolled or admin
policy: Submissions select own or admin
policy: Assignments read own or admin

methods.name: public.is_admin_or_trainer
methods.description: Checks if a user is an admin or trainer based on their UUID.
